data.name: ERROR_BAD_REQUEST
data.value: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

data.name: ERROR_UNAUTHORIZED
data.value: The request requires user authentication.

data.name: ERROR_PAYMENT_REQUIRED
data.value: This code has not yet been implemented and is reserved for use in an upcoming specification.

data.name: ERROR_FORBIDDEN
data.value: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

data.name: ERROR_NOT_FOUND
data.value: The server has not found anything matching the request URI.

data.name: ERROR_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED
data.value: The method specified in the Request-Line is not allowed for the resource identified by the Request-URI.

data.name: ERROR_NOT_ACCEPTABLE
data.value: The resource identified by the request is only capable of generating response entities which have content characteristics acceptable according to the accept headers sent in the request.

data.name: ERROR_PROXY_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED
data.value: That the client must first authenticate itself with the proxy.

data.name: ERROR_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
data.value: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait.

data.name: ERROR_CONFLICT
data.value: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

data.name: ERROR_GONE
data.value: The requested resource is no longer available at the server and no forwarding address is known.

data.name: ERROR_LENGTH_REQUIRED
data.value: The server refuses to accept the request without a defined content length.

data.name: ERROR_PRECONDITION_FAILED
data.value: The precondition given in one or more of the request header fields evaluated to false when it was tested on the server.

data.name: ERROR_PAYLOAD_TOO_LARGE
data.value: The server is refusing to process a request because the request payload is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

data.name: ERROR_URI_TOO_LONG
data.value: The server is refusing to service the request because the request URI is longer than the server is willing to interpret.

data.name: ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE
data.value: The server is refusing to service the request because the entity of the request is in a format not supported by the requested resource for the requested method.

data.name: ERROR_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE
data.value: None of the range-specifier values in a Range request header field overlap the current extent of the selected resource.

data.name: ERROR_EXPECTATION_FAILED
data.value: The expectation given in an Expect request header field could not be met by at least one of the inbound servers.

data.name: ERROR_IM_A_TEAPOT
data.value: The server refuses to brew coffee because it is a teapot.

data.name: ERROR_MISDIRECTED_REQUEST
data.value: The request was directed at a server that is not able to produce a response.

data.name: ERROR_UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY
data.value: The server understands the content type of the request entity and the syntax of the request entity is correct but was unable to process the contained instructions.

data.name: ERROR_LOCKED
data.value: The request has been accepted but processing has not been completed.

data.name: ERROR_FAILED_DEPENDENCY
data.value: The request failed due to failure of a previous request.

data.name: ERROR_UPGRADE_REQUIRED
data.value: The client must switch to a different protocol such as TLS/1.0.

data.name: ERROR_PRECONDITION_REQUIRED
data.value: The origin server requires the request to be conditional.

data.name: ERROR_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
data.value: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

data.name: ERROR_REQUEST_HEADER_FIELDS_TOO_LARGE
data.value: The server is unwilling to process the request because its header fields are too large.

data.name: ERROR_CONNECTION_CLOSED_WITHOUT_RESPONSE
data.value: The server closed the connection without returning a response.

data.name: ERROR_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_LEGAL_REASONS
data.value: The server is denying access to the resource in response to a legal demand.

data.name: ERROR_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
data.value: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

data.name: ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED
data.value: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.

data.name: ERROR_BAD_GATEWAY
data.value: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from the upstream server it accessed in attempting to fulfill the request.

data.name: ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
data.value: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

data.name: ERROR_GATEWAY_TIMEOUT
data.value: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, did not receive a timely response from the upstream server specified by the URI (e.g. HTTP, FTP, LDAP) or some other auxiliary server (e.g. DNS) it needed to access in attempting to complete the request.

data.name: ERROR_HTTP_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: The server does not support, or refuses to support, the HTTP protocol version that was used in the request message.

data.name: ERROR_VARIANT_ALSO_NEGOTIATES
data.value: The server has an internal configuration error: the chosen variant resource is configured to engage in transparent content negotiation itself, and is therefore not a proper end point in the negotiation process.

data.name: ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_STORAGE
data.value: The server is unable to store the representation needed to complete the request.

data.name: ERROR_LOOP_DETECTED
data.value: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request.

data.name: ERROR_BANDWIDTH_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
data.value: The server has exceeded the bandwidth specified by the server administrator; this is often used by shared hosting providers to limit the bandwidth of customers.

data.name: ERROR_NOT_EXTENDED
data.value: The server does not support, or refuses to support, the protocol version that was used in the request message.

data.name: ERROR_NETWORK_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED
data.value: The client needs to authenticate to gain network access.

data.name: ERROR_NETWORK_READ_TIMEOUT
data.value: The server timed out waiting for the network connection.

data.name: ERROR_NETWORK_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
data.value: The server timed out while waiting for a proxy connection.

data.name: ERROR_NOT_TRANSLATED_YET
data.value: This message is not translated yet.

data.name: ERROR_UNKNOWN
data.value: Unknown error.
